long_description: The EST Tool from Burton provides micro-adjustable action, can be operated with gloves on and comes in a pocket-friendly design. It adjusts both traditional and Burton EST(TM) bindings. Includes #2 and #3 Phillips screwdrivers, bottle opener and keychain loop.
short_description: The EST Tool from Burton provides micro-adjustable action, can be operated with gloves on and comes in a pocket-friendly design. It adjusts both traditional and Burton EST(TM) bindings.
